lines.text:
[while rapping]
Let's green egg and ham it!

Who dare to wake me? Ain't gonna mame this a mystery. Don't wanna do time on your wishes three. Watch it, boy! You don't want to dis me! Or I'll dish out my misery. Now. who's that sorry wanna-be that disturbed my z's? If you wanna be number one, I'm sorry boy, that's been done! But if you got the itches for a sack of riches don't matter how avaricious, I'm the man that can grant your wishes! Hey, don't turn your butt on me! I'm the man of the ages, straight out of the pages. Hang on! I'm contagious, outrageous, spontaneous! You can't contain this. I am KAZAAM!
I'm really happy for you.
Where do you think you're going? Make your three wishes and I'm of your face, back in my box and out of this place.
listen Mr. Psychopathic Dork in the Basement, I don't think you're ordering anyone.
Do you realize who I am? I'm your genie!
In that case I wish i was as big as you, but not so stupid
You get no second chances in life, no second chances.
That's right, it's poisoned. I figured if I ended your suffering, mine would end too.

[after he wishes for junk-food to come out of the sky]
So... tell me that wasn't a wish.
Like the main man did with the loaves and the fish?
Yeah... hey... stop rhyming, o.k.

[lifting malik by the neck]
Now, where's Max?
Uh... du... du... du... uh... he... uh... he went down that shaft.
WHAT?
Umm... uh... uh... there was nothin I could do, now put me down...
[starts choking]
... I'm afraid of heights.
Wish not granted!
[Shapes Malik into a basketball, and then slam-dunks him into the Air duct]
Grab my belly and make a wish.
You smell like hippopotamus butt.
I am... Kazaam!
Is that a wish?
That's not a wish, that's an insult!
Don't get all hysterical! Say thank you for your miracle!
I wish I had junk food from here to the sky!
Why not? Higher than high?
